entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 9. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
